input_ref: CHAP v1.2 audit fix — sidebar YAML strip, Partner persona conflict, subtitle alignment
notes: Browser audit of CHAP v1.2 revealed 3 issues. (1) Sidebar widget not stripping YAML — conversational YAML blocks rendered raw in ChapDrawer. Fixed by adding _strip_conversational_yaml to src/backend/api/routes/chap.py (sidebar backend route) and stripConversationalYaml to chapLlm.ts (browser-direct path). Now all three query paths strip YAML: root chap_api.py, nested chap route, and browser-direct. (2) Welcome message said 'Compliance Help & Audit Partner' conflicting with v1.2 persona ('not a compliance partner'). Replaced with 'compliance intelligence layer' framing and canonical greeting. Also fixed casual 'Hey' greeting in buildGreeting(). (3) PSE_COPY chapPanel.subtitle said 'Senior Payroll Director' (v2.0 language). Updated to 'Compliance Intelligence Layer • Read-Only Analysis • Audit-Ready Output' (v1.2). Committed 49a38cb, pushed to main, deployed to Linode.
